titleStmt.title: Earth raining vpon heauen A sermon preached at the assises holden at Nottingham, August 5. 1614. By VVilliam VVorship, Doctor in Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Worship, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Snodham] for Thomas Pauier, and are to be sould at his shop in Iuy-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
